title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner with a REST/CLI API that lets you pull, run and chat with 70+ open-source models (Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, …) on macOS, Linux and Windows.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; pip-installable wrapper around the Ollama REST API with sync & async support.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; npm package that mirrors the Python SDK surface.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package providing Ollama LLM and embeddings wrappers.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, multi-model, file upload, RAG, user auth) shipped as a Docker container.

title: ollama4j – Java SDK for Ollama
summary: Unofficial Java/Kotlin SDK wrapping the Ollama REST API with builders & async support.

title: ollama-cli – Rust CLI
summary: Fast Rust CLI for chatting, pulling and managing Ollama models using the ollama-rs library.

title: ollama-rs – Rust client library
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-copilot – VS Code extension
summary: Free open-source GitHub Copilot alternative: VS Code plugin that uses local Ollama models for inline suggestions.

title: ollama-chatbot – Flutter client
summary: Cross-platform Flutter app that chats with Ollama via REST; available on Android, iOS, macOS, Windows, Linux.

title: ollama-haystack – Haystack integration
summary: Unofficial Haystack node provider letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook – Examples & recipes
summary: Community-curated collection of Python/JS notebooks showing RAG, function-calling, fine-tune, Docker setups, etc.

title: ollama-helm – Kubernetes Helm chart
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal pod autoscaler.

title: ollama-gui – Tauri desktop app
summary: Lightweight cross-platform desktop GUI for Ollama built with Tauri (Rust backend) and React.

title: ollama-nvim – Neovim plugin
summary: Neovim plugin that brings Ollama chat and code generation into the editor with customizable prompts.

title: ollama-django – Django chat app
summary: Simple Django + Channels project demonstrating real-time chat with Ollama over WebSockets.

title: ollama-rb – Ruby gem
summary: Unofficial Ruby client for Ollama; wraps the REST API with Faraday and provides CLI binary.

title: ollama-csharp – .NET SDK
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET Standard 2.0 client library for Ollama with async IEnumerables for streaming.

title: ollama-discord – Discord bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-slack – Slack bot
summary: Lightweight Slack bot using Socket Mode to answer questions powered by your local Ollama instance.
